mapper.select: SELECT dpr.id, dpr. STATUS, dpr.trigger_type, dpr.last_update_date, dpr.project_id, dpr.pipeline_id, dpr.`status`, dpr.creation_date, dpr.business_key, dpr.bpm_definition, dpr.pipeline_name, dpr.edited, dpr.audit_user FROM devops_pipeline_record dpr WHERE dpr.id = #{pipelineRecordId}
mapper.update: UPDATE devops_pipeline_record dpr SET dpr.edited = 1 where dpr.pipeline_id = #{pipelineId}
mapper.select: SELECT dpurr.user_id FROM devops_pipeline_user_record_rel dpurr JOIN devops_pipeline_stage_record dpsr ON dpsr.pipeline_record_id = #{pipelineRecordId} JOIN devops_pipeline_task_record dptr ON dptr.stage_record_id = dpsr.id WHERE dpurr.task_record_id = dptr.id OR dpurr.stage_record_id = dpsr.id
